summary:
Replace the textures of the following robes:
-Telvanni
-Temple Priest
-Miraak
-Cultist
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i66.tinypic.com/2vcc0th.jpg[/img]

DRAGONBORN REQUIRED

The "Dragonborn Mages Robes Retexture Pack" replace the main and powerful magical clothes that appears in the Dragonborn DLC.
Texture are chosen through the archive for offer a "default upgrading".

Replace the textures of the following robes:
- TEMPLE PRIEST - MIRAAK - CULTIST - TELVANNI -

[img]http://i64.tinypic.com/5xrjut.jpg[/img]

[youtube]tOZ_3HJvYwo[/youtube]
Thanks to svaalbard/insane0hflex for the video

[youtube]8I3cUm1zWPY[/youtube]
Thanks to Flammenzunge/SerpentGames for the video

Every details are listed in the original mods (and you can find the link at the end of every description).
You can choose also other retextures for the same robes if you search in my archive (especially for the Telvanni robes).


Textures taken from the official High Resolution Texture Pack
RESOLUTION:

Miraak
Robes:2048x2048
Mask:1024x1024
Gloves:1024x1024

Cultist
Robes:2048x2048
Mask:1024x1024
Gloves:1024x1024
Boots:1024x1024

Temple Priest:
Robes:2048x2048
Hood:2048x2048

Telvanni
Robes:2048x2048[/center]


Install:

NMM: Download with NMM.

MANUAL: Put the texture folder inside the Skyrim/Data folder.


All credits to Bethesda

Enjoy and FUS RO DAH!

Rafuel

[center][img]http://i68.tinypic.com/54sy8.jpg[/img]
